commit message: Added build version updater

New session bug (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=51)
Session stats not displaying properly fixed

Unstable: Preparing ActionBarSherlock release
Added RNC-Ids (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=53)
Fixed multiple sessions at a time
Fixed upload all issue
and many, many other bug fixes
Fixed missing warning on 'delete all sessions'

Report CellId AND radio-network controller id (rnc) instead of just LCID
(http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=53)
Export Dialog wasn't dismissed if upload was simulated only
Disable swip scrolling for map tab
Display message when free wifi has been detected
Better error handling on failed uploads

Improved start screen in landscape mode
(http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=38)
Experimental: Stop scanning on low battery
Performance Optimizations (http://developer.android.com/training/articles/perf-tips.html#Loops)

- Fixed invalid database migration
(https://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=55)
- Fixed some strange bugs on Android 4.4, where controls are null
- Added error message on missing credentials
Fixed crashing map view, when no map has been downloaded
Merging different versions

Fixed broken database migrations
http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=55
Added gopro cameras to wifi blacklists
Display session stats even before GPS fix
GPS not released properly after logging (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=59)
Fixing #61: DB loader script fails if first file is krank
Issue 63 fixed: endless loop on upload when no network available
Updated SSID block list with well-known mobile wifis
Issue 62: Changed timestamp in GPX stamp to UTC
Updated Mapsforge to 0.5.0
Added GraphView library
Layout updates

Updated layout in activities,
Fixed crash in map details,
added option menus
Updated to mapsforge 0.5.0
Updated to mapsforge 0.5.0
Application object (needed for mapsforge initialisation)
Layout
Added new application object to manifest
Fixed problems with services on resume
Fixed check for outdated client version

Minor tweaks on xml file generation:
added begin/end attributed to gps tag
reduced memory consumption
